message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take a bit more since I'm on a tighter deadline with this inflation thing.
Come on, Alice! Inflation is on your side, I should get a bigger share!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  My position is weakening, but your offer was still too low.
You're running out of time, Alice! My share should be bigger!
Bob, this is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point.
